creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: Chusonji-kyo type; sutra written in gold on dark blue paper, cover decorated with floral motif, painted in gold on oxidized silver. Frontispiece with painting of preaching Buddha, also in gold.
medium: gold and silver on indigo paper
title: Chapter 78 of the Greater Sutra of the Perfection of Wisdom
